summary: MY ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON  CODE P0008 TIMING CHAIN ISSUE.  CADILLAC HAS A RECALL ON THE 3.6 TIMING CHAINS BUT MY VIN FOR SOME REASON ISN'T INCLUDED. MY CADILLAC ONLY HAS 76844 MILES ON IT.  THE RECALL THEY HAVE IN PLACE IS FOR 10 YEARS 120000 MILES. AGAIN FOR SOME REASON MY CAR ISN'T INCLUDED EVEN THO ITS THE EXACT SAME ISSUE AND EXACT SAME ENGINE.
